interventions.title: Interventions
interventions.caption: Find out more about the services.

cards.title: Clinical Psychology
cards.description: Through clinical psychology, you can embark on a journey of discovery and personal growth. Using an ethical and responsible approach, we can work through profound personal experiences and build a renewed and strengthened sense of self, so that you can lead a happier life.

cards.title: Performance psychology
cards.description: Inspired by my work with high-performance individuals (in sports, technology, or finance), performance psychology aims to help you become the best version of yourself. If you are aware of your abilities and want to pursue personal and professional excellence, this is the right place for you.

cards.title: Psychology for teams and companies
cards.description: This service is tailor-made for groups of people who know they need to stand out in an increasingly competitive market. Through motivational talks or customized workshops, the goal is to help your team or company develop the strategies needed to reach the next level.

about.title: About
about.name: Dr. Miguel Sá
about.subtitle: CLINICAL and PERFORMANCE | PSYCHOLOGIST and LECTURER
about.bio1: Born in Portugal in 1989, I am a clinical and performance psychologist, having completed my bachelor's degree in Psychological Sciences and my master's degree in Clinical Psychology at the ISPA University Institute, one of the oldest and most prestigious schools of psychology in Portugal.
about.bio2: After graduating in 2013, I have been pursuing my professional passions, in which I am actively involved: clinical psychology, performance psychology, and teaching, which I currently practice at Curtin University Malaysia.
about.bio3: My work as a clinical and performance psychologist is the result of more than a decade of experience, learning from different references in the field and having the opportunity to learn and work in multicultural environments. My main goal as a therapist is to help people develop a deeper understanding of who they are so that they can face their internal conflicts and challenges, and to help them develop healthier strategies so that they can lead happier and more meaningful lives.
about.cta: Are you ready to start the moving process?

interventionsPage.title: How can psychology help you?
interventionsPage.description: Psychology is a science that studies human behavior and mental processes, offering tools for self-knowledge, emotional well-being, and personal development. With professional support, you can identify and transform patterns, thoughts, and behaviors that may be affecting your life.

bullets.title: Emotional well-being
bullets.text: Learn how to manage stress, anxiety, and other emotions that may be affecting your daily life.

bullets.title: Self-knowledge and personal growth
bullets.text: Discover your strengths, areas for improvement, and strategies to become the best version of yourself.

bullets.title: Academic and professional success
bullets.text: Develop study skills, time management, and decision-making skills to achieve your goals.

bullets.title: Healthy relationships
bullets.text: Learn how to communicate effectively and build positive relationships in all areas of your life.

bullets.title: Sports performance
bullets.text: Improve your concentration, confidence, and resilience to optimize your performance in competitions.

interventionsPage.valuesText: Kindness, compassion, openness, and inclusion. These are the true values of the science of therapeutic change and human growth. Diversity and individual differences in the various ways people live and experience life are truly valued as part of the human experience. And your values, culture, ethnicity, sexual orientation, and faith will always be respected. There can be no growth in the therapeutic process without understanding and valuing what makes you unique!
